title: Microreactor Assisted Soft Lithography of Nanostructured Antimony Sulfide Thin Film Patterns: Nucleation, Growth and Application in Solid State Batteries
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00436A, Paper

Bryan Chun, V. Vinay K. Doddapaneni, Marcos Lucero, Changqing Pan, Zhongwei Gao, Zhenxing Feng, Rajiv Malhotra, Chih-hung Chang
This study explores the microreactor-assisted soft lithography (MASL) method for direct, one-step synthesis and patterning of additive-free antimony sulfide (Sb2S3) nanostructured thin films. The results reveal the steady state process...
